welcome.title: welcome to stretchly
welcome.chooseLanguage: To start, please, choose the language you would like to use with stretchly:
welcome.readTutorial: Let stretchly become your favourite app by taking time making it your own. Learn how to personalize it in a quick tutorial.
welcome.skipTutorial: skip tutorial, I can always find it in About window

tutorial.title: stretchly tutorial
tutorial.welcomeText: Taking regular breaks and microbreaks makes you more effective - that is science. But only you know your flow. Get to know stretchly with this quick tutorial and make it your way.
tutorial.microbreaksText: By default, stretchly runs in your tray and shows reminder window every 10 minutes, that is open for 20 seconds, containing an idea for microbreak.
tutorial.breaksText: Every 30 minutes, it shows a window containing an idea for a longer 5-minute break.
tutorial.notificationsText:
You will get notified 30 seconds before breaks (and 10 seconds before microbreak) to be able to prepare to pause the work. 
You can finish break or microbreak early, by clicking the link at the bottom or by using Ctrl/Cmd + x keyboard shortcut (when not in strict mode).
tutorial.tray1Text: You can pause/resume reminding of breaks. On Windows and Mac OS, you can set the app to start at login.
tutorial.tray2Text: You can also skip to the next break or microbreak anytime from the menu, or reset (restart) breaks.
tutorial.tray3Text: Tray tooltip shows information about time left till next (micro)break, number of microbreaks until next break or time left in pause till breaks resume.
tutorial.settings1Text:
Microbreaks and breaks can be customized: 
You can set duration and interval of break 
You can enable/disable breaks 
you can enable/disable strict mode (breaks can't be finished early)
tutorial.settings2Text:
You can choose from different color schemes 
You can pick a sound to be played at the end of the break
tutorial.settings3Text:
You can set break window to be fullscreen 
You can disable showing of break ideas or break notifications or monitoring of system idle time for natural breaks or showing breaks on all of your monitors 
you can choose language for interface
tutorial.thanksText: Every month, it takes a lot of work to remind you to take a break. I hope stretchly will help you lead more balanced life. If that is so you can support me with 'Become a Patron' button in tray menu.
